rdsInstance.initializationQuery:
CREATE TABLE users
(
UserId int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
Email varchar(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
Password varchar(255) NOT NULL,
LastName varchar(255),
FirstName varchar(255),
Address varchar(255),
PRIMARY KEY (UserId)
);

CREATE TABLE users
(
UserId int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
Email varchar(255) NOT NULL,
Password varchar(255) NOT NULL,
LastName varchar(255),
FirstName varchar(255),
Address varchar(255),
PRIMARY KEY (UserId)
);

CREATE TABLE users
(
UserId int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
Email varchar(255) NOT NULL,
Password varchar(255) NOT NULL,
LastName varchar(255),
FirstName varchar(255),
Address varchar(255),
PRIMARY KEY (UserId)
);
